content: कॢप्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [कॢप्-क्त] {@--1@} Arranged, prepared, done, got ready, equipped; कॢप्तविवाहवेषा <ls>R. 6. 10</ls> decked in her nuptial attire. {@--2@} Cut, pared; कॢप्तकेशनखश्मश्रु <ls>Ms. 4. 35.</ls> {@--3@} Caused, produced. {@--4@} Fixed, settled. {@--5@} Thought of, invented. {@--6@} Formed, framed. {@--7@} Ascertained, determined.
